name: ZomPong
description:
What is ZomPong?

ZomPong is a Topdown highscore Shooter but PONG and waaaayyyy to many Zombs.

You fight back zombs with your amazing Pong-gun! It shoots bullets that act like a pong ball in the game pong.


Every wave there come twice as many zombs! this means it can be way worse than this:


Wonder what those logs do? They block off zombs for a while...

here: 

The more waves you survive the harder it gets.

and the sun isnt there forever... you know.
